Submodules¶

atom3d.datasets.datasets module¶

class atom3d.datasets.datasets.LMDBDataset(data_file, transform=None)¶

Bases: torch.utils.data.dataset.Dataset

Creates a dataset from an lmdb file. Adapted from the TAPE repository at https://github.com/songlab-cal/tape/blob/master/tape/datasets.py

Parameters

data_file (Union[str, Path]) – path to LMDB file containing dataset

get(id: str)¶
ids()¶
class atom3d.datasets.datasets.PDBDataset(file_list, transform=None)¶

Bases: torch.utils.data.dataset.Dataset

Creates a dataset from a list of PDB files.

Parameters

  • file_list (list[Union[str, Path]]) – path to LMDB file containing dataset

  • transform (function, optional) – transformation function for data augmentation, defaults to None

class atom3d.datasets.datasets.SDFDataset(file_list, transform=None, read_bonds=False)¶

Bases: torch.utils.data.dataset.Dataset

Creates a dataset from directory of SDF files.

Parameters

  • file_list (list[Union[str, Path]]) – list containing paths to silent files. Assumes one structure per file.

  • transform (function, optional) – transformation function for data augmentation, defaults to None

  • read_bonds (bool, optional) – flag for whether to process bond information from SDF, defaults to False

class atom3d.datasets.datasets.SilentDataset(file_list, transform=None)¶

Bases: torch.utils.data.dataset.IterableDataset

Creates a dataset from rosetta silent files. Can either use a directory of silent files, or a path to one.

Parameters

  • file_list (list[Union[str, Path]]) – list containing paths to silent files

  • transform (function, optional) – transformation function for data augmentation, defaults to None

class atom3d.datasets.datasets.XYZDataset(file_list, transform=None, gdb=False)¶

Bases: torch.utils.data.dataset.Dataset

Creates a dataset from list of XYZ files.

Parameters

  • file_list (list[Union[str, Path]]) – list containing paths to xyz files

  • transform (function) – transformation function for data augmentation, defaults to None

  • gdb (bool, optional) – whether to add new energies with subtracted thermochemical energies (for SMP dataset), defaults to False

data_with_subtracted_thchem_energy(data, df)¶

Adds energies with subtracted thermochemical energies to the data list We only need this for the QM9 dataset (SMP).

atom3d.datasets.datasets.deserialize(x, serialization_format)¶
atom3d.datasets.datasets.get_file_list(input_path, filetype)¶
atom3d.datasets.datasets.load_dataset(file_list, filetype, transform=None, include_bonds=False)¶
atom3d.datasets.datasets.make_lmdb_dataset(dataset, output_lmdb, filter_fn=None, serialization_format='json', include_bonds=False)¶

Make an LMDB dataset from an input dataset.

Parameters

  • input_file_list (torch.utils.data.Dataset) – Path to input files.

  • output_lmdb (Union[str, Path]) – Path to output LMDB.

  • filter_fn (lambda x -> True/False) – Filter to decided if removing files.

  • serialization_format ('json', 'msgpack', 'pkl') – How to serialize an entry.

  • include_bonds (bool) – Include bond information (only available for SDF yet)

atom3d.datasets.datasets.serialize(x, serialization_format)¶
